about_the_game:
Tip: If you're finding the text hard to read in the image below (the story image), turning  up your computer's brightness will help A LOT.

Disclaimer: The story of REMINGTON, the A.I. is entirely fictional. None of it is based on real-life events, NOR is it meant to predict the future. It is simply a story meant to entertain.

For Mac and Linux Users:

Mac users may have to download a free program called Rosetta 2 in order to run this game.

This game has never been tested on a Linux. If the game doesn't work for you, please feel free to screenshot/video capture the error and send it to: cmentertainmenttech@gmail.com.

Credits

All the writing, coding and artwork of this game are done by CM Pictures. NO A.I.s were used for ANY part of the game, as Steam forbids A.I. content for copyright reasons. All the soundtracks used in Episode 1 are made by Infraction (inAudio).

What to Expect?

  • NOTE: Even though the gameplay trailer video has no sound, the actual game does have background music.

  • Each episode is set in a different place. For example, one episode is set in a party, the next episode is set in a military compound.

  • Each episode has many new characters. The main characters will appear in every episode, but each episode will have somewhere between 2 to 6, or 8 new side characters who are just there for the one episode.

  • This is NOT your typical edgy, depressing visual novel. The story is mostly upbeat and focuses on competition, fun and good substance.

  • There are a total of 6 episodes. There will be a time gap between the first episode's release and the other episodes.

  • REMINGTON, the A.I. is the first title of the Millennium Gates series.

content_descriptors.notes:
There is some drinking of alcohol in one of the episodes; NO one gets wasted, just some mild alcohol consumption

There is at least one scenario of a fist-fight between characters. NO blood or gore will be shown, the fight is only described through words

There may be a scene of a hookup between characters. The acts will be described through words, there may be images of them kissing in bed, but there WON'T be any explicit sexual images or explicit word descriptions. It will all be very subtle, romantic and mild, vanilla style.

legal_notice:
All the content of REMINGTON, the A.I. is created by CM Pictures (except the soundtracks). This includes the writing of the story, the coding and all art creations. Please do NOT reuse any elements of the game. You ARE allowed to upload screenshots of the game to Steam.

While the story of this game revolves around Artificial Intelligence, A.I. was NOT used in any of the production. This includes the coding, art and writing for the game -- NO A.I. was used in any way whatsoever.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Silicon Valley Chip Macs may need to download Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: REMINGTON, the A.I.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A linear visual novel about the world's top Artificial Intelligence competing to be NO.1 — one made by the United States government and the other by a private European company. Who will win? And what global conflict will they find themselves in?
